text: Momina adami ate auratam ika duje de saha'ika hana. Iha cagi'a'i da hukama dide hana ate sura'i tom rokade hana. Namaza sathapita karade hana ate zakata ada karade hana. Alaha ate usade rasula di agi'a da palana karade hana. Ihi uha loka hana, jinham â€œte alaha rahimata karega, besaka alaha prabhavi ate tataveta hai
